java/liquibase/preconditions/DBMSPrecondition.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionFailedException;
00006 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionErrorException;
00007 
00012 public class DBMSPrecondition implements Precondition {
00013     private String type;
00014 
00015 
00016     public DBMSPrecondition() {
00017     }
00018 
00019     public String getType() {
00020         return type;
00021     }
00022 
00023     public void setType(String atype) {
00024         this.type = atype.toLowerCase();
00025     }
00026 
00027 
00028     public void check(Database database, DatabaseChangeLog changeLog) throws PreconditionFailedException, PreconditionErrorException {
00029         try {
00030             String dbType = database.getTypeName();
00031             if (!type.equals(dbType)) {
00032                 throw new PreconditionFailedException("DBMS Precondition failed: expected "+type+", got "+dbType, changeLog, this);
00033             }
00034         } catch (PreconditionFailedException e) {
00035             throw e;
00036         } catch (Exception e) {
00037             throw new PreconditionErrorException(e, changeLog, this);
00038         }
00039     }
00040 
00041     public String getTagName() {
00042         return "dbms";
00043     }
00044 
00045 }
